channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 视频：《草原上的小木屋》50 周年庆典......美国经典电视节目《草原上的小木屋》（Little House on the Prairie）在加利福尼亚州西米谷（Simi Valley）举行了 50 周年庆典活动，数千名粉丝参加了此次活动。
item.description:
VIDEO: 'Little House on the Prairie' celebrates 50th anniversary.

An American television classic, Little House on the Prairie, celebrated its 50-year anniversary with an event in Simi Valley, California, attended by thousands of fans.

Fans of the show, which aired over 200… pic.twitter.com/rxalSkhBTI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 27, 2024

item.title: 美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普在复活节假期前出售《圣经》，鼓励他的支持者 "让美国再次祈祷"，并购买他称之为 "最喜欢的书 "的《圣经》。
item.description:
Former US president Donald Trump is selling Bibles ahead of the Easter holiday, encouraging his supporters to "Make America Pray Again" and buy what he describes as his "favorite book" https://t.co/615A6NEBhT pic.twitter.com/AzHiTQ1trn

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 27, 2024

item.title: 美国独立总统候选人小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
item.description:
Independent US presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. has announced Silicon Valley lawyer and political newcomer Nicole Shanahan as his running mate, as he pursues an anti-establishment campaign seen as an increasing threat to Democrat Joe Biden https://t.co/4omly4yPG3 pic.twitter.com/w0QyehWkc2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 委内瑞拉主要反对派联盟周二表示，他们已成功注册了一名代理候选人，将在该国 7 月的大选中与总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolas Maduro）对决，但这并不是他们想要的候选人。
item.description:
Venezuela’s main opposition coalition said Tuesday it had managed to register a proxy candidate to face off against President Nicolas Maduro in the country’s July elections — but not the one it wanted https://t.co/gHTEqfJkax pic.twitter.com/upeyR6vyI3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 据尼日尔官方公报称，尼日尔军事政权首脑阿卜杜拉哈曼-蒂亚尼（Abdourahamane Tiani）将军周二与俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）就 "加强安全合作 "进行了电话交谈。
item.description:
The head of Niger's military regime General Abdourahamane Tiani spoke on Tuesday by telephone with Russian President Vladimir Putin about "strengthening security cooperation," according to an official communique https://t.co/lLo9r9Xzjq pic.twitter.com/Tzr8eWvJB8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 一艘失控的货轮撞上了巴尔的摩港最繁忙的桥梁之一，当地警方只来得及对船员发出的最后求救信号做出反应。
item.description:
With a runaway cargo ship bearing down on one of Baltimore harbor's busiest bridges, local police had just moments to react to a last-ditch Mayday call from its crew.

Police radio dispatches captured the panic as the bridge collapsed https://t.co/Rt5c3O7KBS pic.twitter.com/R3umDyxnn9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 周二，负责审理唐纳德-特朗普涉嫌向艳星支付封口费一案的纽约法官对这位前总统下达了部分禁言令。
item.description:
The New York judge presiding over Donald Trump's trial over alleged hush money payments to a porn star slapped a partial gag order on the former president on Tuesday https://t.co/05SeuFn3b2 pic.twitter.com/kjosC4jYDA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 周二，马来西亚一家法院指控一家小型连锁超市的五名高管及其供应商伤害宗教感情，原因是该超市的一家门店出售了几双印有 "真主 "字样的袜子。@AFP
item.description:
A Malaysian court charged five executives from a mini-mart chain and its supplier with hurting religious feelings Tuesday after several pairs of socks emblazoned with the word "Allah" were put on sale in one of its stores. ⁦@AFP⁩ https://t.co/R4UbYe1h3w

— Satish Cheney (@SatishCheney) March 26, 2024

item.title: 两名#莫斯科袭击#嫌疑人 "自由 "旅行，因为没有逮捕令：土耳其官员：@法新社的报道
item.description:
Two #MoscowAttack suspects travelled 'freely' because no arrest warrant: Turkish official: our @AFP story https://t.co/WON2tnT0Gy

— Fulya Özerkan (@FulyaOzerkan) March 26, 2024

item.title: 肯尼亚当局周二开始向悲痛欲绝的亲属发放末日饥饿邪教受害者的遗体。
item.description:
Kenyan authorities on Tuesday began releasing the bodies of victims of a doomsday starvation cult to distraught relatives, almost a year since the discovery of mass graves in a grisly case that shocked the world https://t.co/LSM6Aa9mGS pic.twitter.com/E1MXCaj5Wn

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国周二表示，将继续向被围困的加沙地带空投援助物资，尽管哈马斯曾恳求美国停止这种做法，因为哈马斯称有 18 人在试图获取食品包裹时丧生。
item.description:
The United States said Tuesday it would continue airdrops of aid to besieged Gaza, despite pleas from Hamas to stop the practice after it said 18 people had died trying to reach food packages https://t.co/5f9prmlCrv pic.twitter.com/lMm4iEBA7K

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 根据法新社看到的一份官方法令，马里执政军政府以 "扰乱公共秩序的威胁 "为由，禁止一个罕见的新反对派联盟在巴马科开展活动。
item.description:
Mali's ruling junta has banned the activities of a rare new opposition coalition in Bamako, citing "threats of disturbance to public order," according to an official decree seen by AFP https://t.co/Sopowes0q6 pic.twitter.com/edkbtucRZC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 肯尼亚当局向亲属发放首批沙卡霍拉邪教屠杀的尸体。
item.description:
Kenyan authorities releases first Shakahola cult massacre bodies to relatives. pic.twitter.com/tIXSwzQfGa

— Hillary Orinde (@OrindeHillary) March 26, 2024

item.title: 这段在网上广为流传的视频并未显示美国巴尔的摩市一座主要桥梁发生爆炸。
item.description:
This video circulating widely online does not show an explosion on a major bridge in the US city of Baltimore.

The clip depicts an October 2022 blast at the Kerch bridge connecting Russia with the annexed Crimea peninsula https://t.co/2V3iMfv90b pic.twitter.com/tSU2E4Dc4E

— AFP Fact Check 🔎 (@AFPFactCheck) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国华盛顿州州长签署了一项权利法案，将脱衣舞女与从事其他工作的人员置于同等的法律地位，从而使脱衣舞女赢得了工作场所保护。
item.description:
Strippers in the US state of Washington have won workplace protections after the governor signed a bill of rights putting them on the same legal footing as people in any other job https://t.co/jDHQcWYp8t

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 越南呼吁美国承认其市场经济地位，并表示加强贸易关系将使华盛顿在关键领域受益，因为越南正寻求从中国向多元化发展。
item.description:
Vietnam is calling on the United States to recognize it as a market economy, saying stronger trade ties would benefit Washington in key areas as it seeks to diversify from China https://t.co/OP4fEzh82Z pic.twitter.com/Nvs857GFzx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国国防部长劳埃德-奥斯汀（Lloyd Austin）周二告诉以色列国防部长约阿夫-加兰特（Yoav Gallant），加沙的平民伤亡 "过高"，并提出了以色列在加沙南部采取大规模行动的替代方案
item.description:
US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin told his Israeli counterpart Yoav Gallant Tuesday that civilian casualties in Gaza are "too high" and suggested alternatives to a major Israeli operation in the territory's south https://t.co/UCfYv3KCvs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在巴黎为奥运会全力清理塞纳河之际，游艇船主斯蒂芬-巴肖特（Stephane Bachot）是将自家厨房和浴室接入城市下水道的约 230 名河道居民之一。
item.description:
As Paris races to clean up the River Seine for the Olympics, houseboat owner Stephane Bachot is one of around 230 river dwellers to have hooked up his kitchen and bathroom to the city sewers https://t.co/YpTUigOhQu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在一名商人因拒绝支付保护费而被杀害的波哥大社区的街道上，出现了由退伍士兵组成的 "自卫 "团体，他们手持武器，身着迷彩服，时刻监视着人们的一举一动。
item.description:
On the streets of a Bogota neighborhood where a businessman was killed for refusing to pay protection money, "self-defense" groups of retired soldiers sporting weapons and camouflage gear have popped up, keeping a watchful eye on every movement https://t.co/ITuBzjaxdR pic.twitter.com/1hhwrLcs2n

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 法官已下令公开 eBay 和贝宝记录，其中可能包含一名大英博物馆前雇员出售据称从其藏品中窃取的物品的证据
item.description:
A judge has ordered the disclosure of eBay and PayPal records that may contain evidence that a former British Museum employee sold items allegedly stolen from its collection https://t.co/OnO97m2gE2 pic.twitter.com/XxopZOEVrA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 欧盟成员国周二同意在该集团的共同农业政策（CAP）下取消更多生态友好型要求，以平息农民长达数月之久的抗议活动。
item.description:
EU member states Tuesday agreed to unpick more eco-friendly requirements under the bloc's common agricultural policy (CAP) in a new bid to pacify months-long protests by farmers – who faced off with riot police in Brussels for the third time in two months https://t.co/CG2iY2mC2v pic.twitter.com/rxP1K9ISH3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 巴西鲁-迪奥马耶-法耶（Bassirou Diomaye Faye）在周日的投票中获胜，成为塞内加尔有史以来最年轻的总统。
item.description:
Bassirou Diomaye Faye will become Senegal's youngest ever president after winning Sunday's vote on a ticket of systemic overhaul following years of deadly unrest, economic stagnation and political crisis https://t.co/CZrp38xTgE pic.twitter.com/IvGZV6xDmb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 艾哈迈德-哈基姆（Ahmed al-Hakim）27 岁的弟弟在叙利亚西北部圣战组织控制的监狱中被折磨致死，这引发了罕见的抗议活动，居民和活动人士纷纷指责反对派堡垒侵犯人权。
item.description:
When Ahmed al-Hakim's 27-year-old brother was tortured to death in prison in Syria's jihadist-run northwest, it sparked rare protests amid accusations from residents and activists of rights violations in the opposition bastionhttps://t.co/mQOw1sBI8K pic.twitter.com/Gv88VOU78m

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: "我们是加沙人民，等待援助物资的投放，甘愿为一罐豆子献出生命--然后我们将豆子分给 18 个人"。 @AFP
item.description:
"We are the people of Gaza, waiting for aid drops, willing to die to get a can of beans -- which we then share among 18 people." https://t.co/YC88ffxuPl @AFP

— Alice Hackman (@alicehackman) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在法国首都的一个狭小的电视演播室里，两位未曾露面的阿富汗妇女面对镜头，她们的任务是为家乡的女同胞提供一条生命线。@AFP 的 @PeytermannL 写道：
item.description:
In a tiny television studio in the French capital, two unveiled Afghan women face the camera on a mission to provide a lifeline to their fellow countrywomen back home. @AFP's @PeytermannL writes: https://t.co/UzXDvv9Gfp pic.twitter.com/7d1dfEfXgi

— Alice Hackman (@alicehackman) March 26, 2024

item.title: 法国希望奥运会能推动塞纳-圣但尼地区的发展，并重塑塞纳-圣但尼地区作为犯罪高发区的形象。
item.description:
Despite its name, the Paris Olympics will take place mostly in Seine-Saint-Denis.

France hopes the Games will turbo-charge ongoing development there, as well as recast Seine-Saint-Denis's image as a crime-ridden collection of banlieues https://t.co/e2bYP3uK10 pic.twitter.com/k2yCs44Zch

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: @dpfunke 为 @AFP 提供的最新消息：一艘轮船撞毁了巴尔的摩的一座大桥后，各平台上的阴谋论者将一切都归咎于网络攻击、以色列、企业多元化计划--即使官方称没有迹象表明存在恐怖主义。
item.description:
New w/ @dpfunke for @AFP:

After a ship took out a Baltimore bridge, conspiracy theorists across platforms are blaming everything from cyberattacks to Israel to corporate diversity initiatives -- even as officials say there is no indication of terrorism.https://t.co/vEaCcfS9Zi

— Bill McCarthy (@billdmccarthy) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最高法院周二正在权衡下级法院对米非司酮实施的限制，米非司酮是美国最广泛用于终止妊娠的药物 ➡️。
item.description:
The Supreme Court on Tuesday was weighing restrictions imposed by a lower court on mifepristone, the drug that is most widely used in the United States to terminate pregnancies ➡️ https://t.co/PthY9BlB8n pic.twitter.com/rqfjRU30MA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 周二，在巴基斯坦西北部一个大型水坝建筑工地工作的五名中国公民和他们的司机被一名自杀式炸弹袭击者炸死，巴基斯坦官员说 ➡️
item.description:
Five Chinese nationals working on a major dam construction site were killed along with their driver on Tuesday when a suicide bomber targeted their vehicle in northwest Pakistan, officials said ➡️ https://t.co/vyIKXgBexz pic.twitter.com/fi93GhROQl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: #印度--在加尔各答，女孩们在庆祝印度教春季色彩节 Holi 时被涂上了 "Gulal"。
item.description:
#India - Girls smeared with ‘Gulal' as they celebrate Holi, the Hindu spring festival of colours, in Kolkata.
📸@Dibyangshus #AFP pic.twitter.com/XVuSmNh1zK

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 25, 2024
